api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: Convert Currency value from and to.

api_list.name: Free Exchange Rates
api_list.description: Convert Currency value from and to.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency38.p.rapidapi.com/currency/free/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency38.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Free Convert
api_list.description: Convert Currency value from and to.

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: Type in the ISO Currency Code of the desired currency you're converting from. Eg. **USD**

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The value you want to convert. Eg **12**

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Type in the ISO Currency Code of the desired currency you're converting to. Eg. **AUD**
